name: Crazyball Rush
description:
This is a game made for Gamejam #Bada SochGame #BadaSoch.

It has  Bada Door, Bada Spoon

Some Controls are not written such as:

Press Enter for Mouse Capture

Press Escape to show Cursor

Press F5 to switch between Cinematic and Normal Camera

Cinematic Camera is in built feature in Godot game engine with name Interpolated Camera.

This game took me 6 days to make 

2 days for Player 

3 days for Level

and 1 day for a little polishing

It may ask or not ask for network permission because I was trying to Implement

Multiplayer but time didn't allowed me.

I Challenge you to complete level in 70 seconds

Android version does not have cloudy sky because of performance reasons.

Touch controls tip: You need to first hold to change perspective then use the joystick.

Have Fun :)
